title: WHAT DOES HYPNOSIS FEEL LIKE? WHICH ARE THE HYPNOTIC STATES? / Q&A with Dr. Paret
description:
In this video, Dr. Marco Paret will answer the question "What does hypnosis feel like?" in the "Q&A with Dr. Paret" series. He will explain how the subjects feel in the different kinds of hypnotic states: catalepsy, somnambulism, fascination, ecstasy, lethargy. Feel free to ask him more questions in the comment section, he will answer them with pleasure. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
